data.name: Robotpencil Presents: Understanding 3D for Concept
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


#label_about_the_series

This tutorial is about understanding 3D for concept art. Learn how to understand your 3D software, working from 3D to Photoshop and applying your skills to your 3D model and bringing it into Photoshop. This includes 100+ minutes of video and psd files.
data.about_the_game: This tutorial is about understanding 3D for concept art. Learn how to understand your 3D software, working from 3D to Photoshop and applying your skills to your 3D model and bringing it into Photoshop. This includes 100+ minutes of video and psd files.
data.short_description: This tutorial is about understanding 3D for concept art.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
